title: Spotify Profile
description: A Spotify profile page made with Svelte and TailwindCSS. It uses the Spotify API to fetch the user's data. And it uses the Spotify Web Playback SDK to play the user's top tracks.

title: A Simple Blog
description: A website that aims to be a simple blog. It uses SvelteKit and TailwindCSS. It uses the Netlify CMS to manage the posts. It was ultimately a huge success. It all started with a simple idea. We decided to do something radical. We decided to make a blog. We wanted to make a blog that was simple, easy to use, and easy to manage. We wanted to make a blog that was easy to use, easy to manage, and easy to manage.

title: Weather App
description: An original weather app that aims to be simple and easy to use. It features a simple and clean design. It uses the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch the weather data. It uses the Google Maps API to fetch the location data.
